title: PATCH NOT UPDATING 6.21
body:
Please help
Since last night ive been trying to update to the new patch 6.21 and its not working..it keeps saying update error at 33%
please help dying to play

replies.body: At this % of the process, the patcher needs to connect to the patching servers to download updates but is being blocked .  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FWJdeoWN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-20T15:34:33.345+0000)
>
> At this % of the process, the patcher needs to connect to the patching servers to download updates but is being blocked .  Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.

I've tried doing many things in that guide and it still has not worked.  Are there any of those things that are more likely to be the issue than others?
Nope, it's important to perform each step to rule out all possibilities and to make sure everything is running in order.
